// ** Reactstrap Imports import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody, CardText } from 'reactstrap' const ListInline = () => { return ( Inline Lists To create a inline list use .list-inline class with <ul> tag and, class{' '} .list-inline-item with <li> tag.

Use inline numbers, alphabet, icons etc... for ordered Inline List.

  • Chocolate
  • Cake
  • Ice-Cream
  • 1. Chocolate
  • 2. Cake
  • 3. Ice-Cream
  • $ 250
  • $ 110
  • $ 890
 ) } export default ListInline
